===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{elements|Fe|{{ja-r|マンガン}}|Mn|{{ja-r|コバルト}}|Co|lang=ja|sort=てつ}}
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}}
{{wikipedia|Iron}}
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|てつ|yomi=o}}

{{bor|ja|ltc|sort=てつ|鐵|tr={{IPAchar|/tʰet̚/}}||iron}}. Compare modern {{etyl|cmn|-}} reading ''tiě'', {{etyl|hak|-}} ''thiet''.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|てつ|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|てつ|kyu=鐵}}

# [[iron]], the [[metal]] and the [[metallic]] [[chemical element]]
# {{qualifier|more generally}} [[steel]]
# {{qualifier|figuratively}} a [[blade]], a [[knife]], a [[sword]], a [[weapon]]
# {{qualifier|figuratively}} something extremely [[strong]]
# short for {{m|ja|鉄色|tr=tetsu iro||steely black}}
# short for {{m|ja|鉄砲|tr=teppō|pos=literally “cannon”, but in this case, refers to the poisonous ''[[fugu]]'' blowfish or dishes made from it}}

=====Idioms=====
* {{ja-r|鉄は熱いうちに打て|てつ は あつい うち に うて}}: “[[strike while the iron is hot]]”

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くろがね|r=y}}

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くろがね|黒|tr1=kuro|t1=black|金|tr2=kane|t2=metal}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> {{rendaku2|kane|gane|sort=くろがね}} Compare the ''black'' in {{cog|en|blacksmith}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くろがね|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|黒金}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くろがね|kyu=鐵}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=くろがね|archaic}} [[iron]]
# {{qualifier|figuratively}} something extremely [[strong]]

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かね}}

From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=かね}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The four kanji spellings of this term, {{m|ja|金||gold}}, {{m|ja|銀||silver}}, {{m|ja|銅||copper}}, and {{lang|ja|鉄}} (“iron”), hint at the importance of each of these four metals in ancient Japan.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|かね|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|金}}, {{l|ja|銀}}, {{l|ja|銅}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かね|kyu=鐵}}

# {{alternative spelling of|lang=ja|金|dot=:}} [[metal]]; [[money]]

=====Usage notes=====
The {{l|ja|金}} spelling is the most common for this term.
